data.lyric:
[ti:Gasoline]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Gasoline - The Weeknd
[00:07.75]Lyrics by：Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:15.50]Composed by：Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:23.26]It's five a.m. my time again
[00:25.22]I've soaking up the moon can't sleep
[00:27.87]
[00:31.09]It's five a.m. my time again
[00:33.03]I'm calling and you know it's me
[00:35.70]
[00:38.86]I'm pushing myself further
[00:40.49]I'm just trying to feel my heartbeat beat
[00:43.36]
[00:44.88]Beat
[00:45.56]
[00:46.65]I wrap my hands around your neck
[00:48.60]You love it when I always squeeze
[00:51.27]
[00:54.42]It's five a.m. and I'm high again
[00:56.37]And you can see that I'm in pain
[00:59.16]
[01:02.25]I've fallen into emptiness
[01:04.13]I want you 'cause we're both insane
[01:06.68]
[01:10.07]I'm staring into the abyss
[01:11.93]I'm looking at myself again
[01:14.65]
[01:17.88]I'm dozing off to R.E.M
[01:19.79]I'm trying not to lose my faith
[01:22.72]
[01:24.10]And I love it when you watch me sleep
[01:26.48]
[01:28.10]You spin me 'round so I can breathe
[01:31.98]It's only safe for you and me
[01:34.21]
[01:35.87]I know you won't let me OD
[01:38.01]
[01:39.74]And if I finally die in peace
[01:42.38]
[01:43.66]Just wrap my body in these sheets
[01:47.62]And pour out the gasoline
[01:50.01]
[01:51.46]It don't mean much to me
[01:53.90]
[01:56.95]It's five a.m. I'm nihilist
[01:58.78]I know there's nothing after this
[02:01.48]
[02:04.70]Obsessing over aftermaths
[02:06.61]Apocalypse and hopelessness
[02:09.27]
[02:12.54]The only thing I understand
[02:14.38]Is zero sum of tenderness
[02:16.85]
[02:19.52]Tenderness
[02:20.38]Oh baby please just hold me close
[02:22.27]Make me believe there's more to live
[02:25.04]
[02:28.49]Around around around around we go
[02:33.58]
[02:34.15]In this game called life we are not free
[02:36.61]
[02:42.14]And I love it when you watch me sleep
[02:44.55]
[02:46.15]You spin me 'round so I can breathe
[02:50.04]It's only safe for you and me
[02:52.45]Don't let me go
[02:54.26]I know you won't let me OD
[02:56.04]Don't you let me go
[02:58.10]And if I finally die in peace
[03:00.39]Oh yeah
[03:01.20]
[03:01.82]Just wrap my body in these sheets
[03:05.66]And pour out the gasoline
[03:08.40]
[03:09.52]It don't mean much to me
data.trans:
[ti:Gasoline]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.75]//
[00:15.50]//
[00:23.26]凌晨五点 又到了属于我的时间
[00:25.22]我沐浴在月光下 辗转难眠
[00:27.87]
[00:31.09]凌晨五点 又到了属于我的时间
[00:33.03]我给你打去了电话 你也知道打电话的人是我
[00:35.70]
[00:38.86]我对自我充满厌恶
[00:40.49]我只想再次感受心脏的跳动
[00:43.36]
[00:44.88]心跳
[00:45.56]
[00:46.65]我用手掐住你的脖颈
[00:48.60]你一直都喜欢我让你这样窒息的感觉
[00:51.27]
[00:54.42]凌晨五点 我又兴奋了起来
[00:56.37]你看得出来 我内心痛苦不堪
[00:59.16]
[01:02.25]我坠入了空虚之中
[01:04.13]我想要你 因为你和我都一样疯狂
[01:06.68]
[01:10.07]我凝视着深渊
[01:11.93]我又在审视自己
[01:14.65]
[01:17.88]我听着R.E.M乐队的歌 昏昏欲睡
[01:19.79]我努力不让自己失去信仰
[01:22.72]
[01:24.10]我喜欢你在我身边看着我慢慢睡去
[01:26.48]
[01:28.10]你让我感觉天旋地转 这样我才能够呼吸
[01:31.98]只有这样对你我来说才算安全
[01:34.21]
[01:35.87]我知道你不会让我过分沉迷药物
[01:38.01]
[01:39.74]如果我终于在平静中死去
[01:42.38]
[01:43.66]那就用床单包裹住我的身体
[01:47.62]再倒些汽油
[01:50.01]
[01:51.46]这对我算不上什么
[01:53.90]
[01:56.95]现在是凌晨五点 我是虚无主义者
[01:58.78]我知道这之后什么都不会有
[02:01.48]
[02:04.70]为可能发生的后果困扰
[02:06.61]担心大灾难 担心会绝望
[02:09.27]
[02:12.54]我只明白
[02:14.38]温柔只有一个人能拥有
[02:16.85]
[02:19.52]温柔
[02:20.38]宝贝 请紧紧抱住我
[02:22.27]让我相信 未来有更多活下去的动力
[02:25.04]
[02:28.49]我们绕了一圈又一圈
[02:33.58]
[02:34.15]在这场叫做人生的游戏中 我们并不自由
[02:36.61]
[02:42.14]我喜欢你在我身边看着我慢慢睡去
[02:44.55]
[02:46.15]你让我感觉天旋地转 这样我才能够呼吸
[02:50.04]只有这样对你我来说才算安全
[02:52.45]不要放开我的手
[02:54.26]我知道你不会让我过分沉迷药物
[02:56.04]不要放我离开
[02:58.10]如果我终于在平静中死去
[03:00.39]//
[03:01.20]
[03:01.82]那就用床单包裹住我的身体
[03:05.66]再倒些汽油
[03:08.40]
[03:09.52]这对我算不上什么
